enumValues.description: Unique identifier of the account that owns the site.
enumValues.name: account_id

enumValues.description: Unique identifier of the site where the socket is deployed.
enumValues.name: site_id

enumValues.description: Unique identifier of the Socket (Cato edge device).
enumValues.name: device_id

enumValues.description: The name or ID of the physical or logical interface on the Socket device (e.g., eth0, cell1).
enumValues.name: socket_interface

enumValues.description: Describes the interface role such as primary, backup, cellular, or none.
enumValues.name: socket_interface_role

enumValues.description: Indicates the high-availability (HA) role of the device (e.g., active, standby).
enumValues.name: ha_role

enumValues.description: Type of physical interface (e.g., ethernet, cellular).
enumValues.name: physical_interface_type

enumValues.description: Type of transport used by the interface (e.g., wired, lte, 5g, wifi).
enumValues.name: transport_type

enumValues.description: SIM card number (for cellular interfaces).
enumValues.name: sim_num

enumValues.description: Total bytes sent upstream (from the device to the network).
enumValues.name: bytes_upstream

enumValues.description: Total bytes received downstream (from the network to the device).
enumValues.name: bytes_downstream

enumValues.description: Combined total of upstream and downstream bytes.
enumValues.name: bytes_total

enumValues.description: Current upload throughput in Mbps.
enumValues.name: throughput_upstream

enumValues.description: Current download throughput in Mbps.
enumValues.name: throughput_downstream

enumValues.description: Human-readable name of the site.
enumValues.name: site_name

enumValues.description: Generic signal strength indicator (often maps to bars or percentage).
enumValues.name: cellular_signal_strength

enumValues.description: Reference Signal Received Quality – a key LTE/5G metric for link quality (dB).
enumValues.name: cellular_rsrq

enumValues.description: Reference Signal Received Power – measures LTE/5G signal strength (dBm).
enumValues.name: cellular_rsrp

enumValues.description: Received Signal Strength Indicator – legacy strength metric (dBm).
enumValues.name: cellular_rssi

enumValues.description: Signal to Interference + Noise Ratio – LTE/5G metric for signal clarity (dB).
enumValues.name: cellular_sinr

description:
Provides historical metrics for physical and logical interfaces on Cato Sockets.
This API enables detailed monitoring of LAN, WAN, Tunnel, Bypass, and Off-Cloud traffic, including throughput, bandwidth usage, and cellular signal quality.
name: socketPortMetrics

enumValues.description: A reference to a configured Account under reseller
enumValues.name: account

enumValues.description: A reference to a configured Site within Account
enumValues.name: site

enumValues.description: A reference to the configured VPN User within Account
enumValues.name: vpnUser

enumValues.description: Geographical and political entity recognized internationally
enumValues.name: country

enumValues.description: Represents a state or territory within a country. It is a sub-division of the country
enumValues.name: countryState

enumValues.description: Time zone, which is a geographical region where clocks are set to the same time
enumValues.name: timezone

enumValues.description: A reference to the configured Host within Site
enumValues.name: host

enumValues.description: Any entity (matches everything)
enumValues.name: any

enumValues.description: A reference to the configured Network Interface within Site
enumValues.name: networkInterface

enumValues.description: An account administrator (user in Cato Console)
enumValues.name: admin

enumValues.description: A reference to Local Routing Rule within Site
enumValues.name: localRouting

enumValues.description: A reference to LAN Firewall Rule within Site
enumValues.name: lanFirewall

enumValues.description: An external IP address in a specific PoP reserved for the account
enumValues.name: allocatedIP

enumValues.description: union of the globalRange and a Subnet
enumValues.name: siteRange

enumValues.description: l4 services for LAN firewall rules
enumValues.name: simpleService

enumValues.description: Site licenses available for use
enumValues.name: availableSiteUsage

enumValues.description: Pooled licenses available for use
enumValues.name: availablePooledUsage

enumValues.description: A reference to DHCP Relay Group within account
enumValues.name: dhcpRelayGroup

enumValues.description: Combination of protocol (TCP, UDP, TCP/UDP, ICMP) and port number
enumValues.name: portProtocol

enumValues.description: A settlement with over 1K population
enumValues.name: city

fieldsMap.description: fields in map format (see Map scalar)
fieldsMap.name: fieldsMap

enumValues.description: health analytics for the site
enumValues.name: score

enumValues.description: The number of occurrences for this unit
enumValues.name: count

enumValues.description: For metrics that are measured in seconds, such as tunnelAge, the number of seconds
enumValues.name: seconds

enumValues.description: Bits per second
enumValues.name: bps

enumValues.description: Bytes per second
enumValues.name: bytesPerSec
